description: Single storey detached outbuilding for domestic use and associated landscaping works (following demolition of existing outbuilding)
decision_conditions: The development to which this consent relates must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date on which the consent is granted.

Reason: To comply with the provisions of Section 18(1) of the Planning (Listed Buildings and Conservation Areas) Act 1990, as amended, to prevent the accumulation of unimplemented listed building consents and to enable the Local Planning Authority to review the situation at the end of this period if the development has not begun. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title number(s) BD531.PL02.03 - Existing Garage Plans & Elevations, BD531.PL02.03 - Proposed Building Plans Elevations & Sections, BD531.PL02.03 - Proposed Landscaping Plan, Design & Access Statement (ref: BD531 - PL02) prepared by Barnes Design

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the shall be those as listed within the documents submitted with this planning application.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 7.4, 7B and 7D of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013), policies 1.1 (h)(j), 1.2 (f), 2.1 and 2.10, and policies 7.1, 7.2, 7.4 and 7.6 of the London Plan (2016). | The outbuilding hereby permitted shall be used for domestic purposes ancillary to the enjoyment of 8 Bedford Road, Chiswick, W4 1JJ only, and not for any other use.

Reason: To prevent the creation of a separate self-contained residential unit of accommodation in the interests of the living conditions of the existing and future residents of the site and to ensure that the use of the building does not, by reason of any other activity, harm the living conditions in the area, in accordance with Policies 1.1,1.2 & 3.8 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), Policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), Policies 3.5, 7.4-7.6 of the London Plan (2016), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2019). | No kitchen shall be installed into the outbuilding at any time.

Reason: To prevent the creation of a separate self-contained residential unit of accommodation in the interests of the living conditions of the existing and future residents of the site and to ensure that the use of the building does not, by reason of any other activity, harm the living conditions in the area, in accordance with policies 1.1,1.2 & 3.8 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012) and Policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), Policies 3.5, 7.4-7.6 of the London Plan (2016), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2019). | No windows or other openings (other than those shown on the submitted plans) shall be formed in the walls or roof of the building permitted.

Reason: To protect residential amenity in accordance with Policies 1.1, 1.2 & 3.8 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), Policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), Policies 7.4 & 7.6 of the London Plan (2016), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2019). | The hard and soft landscaping works to dwelling hereby approved, shown on the drawings listed in condition 2, shall be implemented prior to the first occupation of the development, or in accordance with a programme agreed by the local planning authority, and henceforth maintained.

Reason:  To ensure that the development is landscaped in the visual interests of the area in accordance with policies 7.4 and 7.5 of the London Plan (2016); and policy 7.4 of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013).
